channel.title: Elections on Steve's Blog

item.title: County Election Results 4 May 2017
item.description: Elections in North Herts Congratulations to Michael Muir, Judi Billing, David Barnard, Derek Ashley, Richard Thake, Simon Bloxham, Terry Hone, Fiona Hill and Steve Jarvis for winning County Council seats. Also congratulations to Ray Shakespeare-Smith and Sarah Dingley in District bye-elections. For full results in North Herts visit the NHDC website.
